summary: I BOUGHT 2010 FORD ESCAPE 3,MONTHS AGO NOTICED CUTTING G OFF TOOK TO PEP BOYS SAID NO WORRIES. NOW CHECK ENGINE LIGHT COMES IN TOOL LIGHT CUTS OFF GOING DOWN ROAD HESITATES CUTS OFF  AT LIGHTS   SCARED. FORD SAYS IT WILL COST ME 400 OR MORE TO FIX FORD ELECTRONIC THROTTLE BODY. CODE P2119. HELP ME PLEASE I READ ABOUT THE EXTENDED WARRANTY.
